016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.json;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.*;
020
021import java.net.URI;
022import java.util.*;
023import java.util.function.Function;
024import java.util.stream.Collector;
025
026/**
027 * Marker interface with helper methods to denote a model that is backed by JSON.
028 *
029 * @author rickardoberg
030 */
031public interface JsonElement {
032    ContainerNode<?> json();
033
034    default ObjectNode object() {
035        ContainerNode<?> json = json();
036        if (json instanceof ObjectNode object)
037            return object;
038        else
039            return null;
040    }
041
042    default ArrayNode array() {
043        ContainerNode<?> json = json();
044        if (json instanceof ArrayNode array)
045            return array;
046        else
047            return null;
048    }
049
050    default boolean has(String name) {
051        return lookup(object(), name).isPresent();
052    }
053
054    default Optional<JsonNode> getJson(String name) {
055        return lookup(object(), name);
056    }
057
058    default Optional<String> getString(String name) {
059        return getJson(name).map(JsonNode::textValue);
060    }
061
062    default Optional<URI> getURI(String name) {
063
064        return getString(name).map(s -> s.replace('\\','/')).map(URI::create);
065    }
066
067    default Optional<Integer> getInteger(String name) {
068        return getJson(name).flatMap(value ->
069        {
070            if (value instanceof NumericNode number) {
071                return Optional.of(number.intValue());
072            }
073            try {
074                return Optional.of(Integer.valueOf(value.asText()));
075            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
076                return Optional.empty();
077            }
078        });
079    }
080
081    default Optional<Long> getLong(String name) {
082        return getJson(name).flatMap(value ->
083        {
084            if (value instanceof NumericNode number) {
085                return Optional.of(number.longValue());
086            }
087            try {
088                return Optional.of(Long.valueOf(value.asText()));
089            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
090                return Optional.empty();
091            }
092        });
093    }
094
095    default Optional<Boolean> getBoolean(String name) {
096        return getJson(name).map(JsonNode::asBoolean);
097    }
098
099    default Optional<Boolean> getFalsy(String name) {
100        return getJson(name).map(value ->
101                switch (value.getNodeType()) {
102                    case ARRAY -> !value.isEmpty();
103                    case BINARY -> true;
104                    case BOOLEAN -> value.booleanValue();
105                    case MISSING -> false;
106                    case NULL -> false;
107                    case NUMBER -> value.numberValue().longValue() != 0;
108                    case OBJECT -> true;
109                    case POJO -> true;
110                    case STRING -> !value.textValue().equals("");
111                });
112    }
113
114    default <T> Optional<T> getObjectAs(String name, Function<ObjectNode, T> mapper) {
115        return getJson(name).map(ObjectNode.class::cast).map(mapper);
116    }
117
118    default Optional<Iterable<JsonNode>> getList(String name) {
119        return getJson(name).map(ArrayNode.class::cast);
120    }
121
122    default <T> Optional<List<T>> getListAs(String name, Function<JsonNode, T> mapper) {
123        return getJson(name).map(ArrayNode.class::cast).map(array -> getValuesAs(array, mapper));
124    }
125
126    default <T> Optional<List<T>> getObjectListAs(String name, Function<ObjectNode, T> mapper) {
127        return getJson(name).map(ArrayNode.class::cast).map(array -> getValuesAs(array, mapper));
128    }
129
130    default <T extends Enum<T>> Optional<T> getEnum(String name, Class<T> enumClass) {
131        Optional<String> value = getString(name);
132
133        if (value.isPresent()) {
134            try {
135                return Optional.of(Enum.valueOf(enumClass, value.get()));
136            } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
137                return Optional.empty();
138            }
139        } else {
140            return Optional.empty();
141        }
142    }
143
144    default Map<String, JsonNode> asMap()
145    {
146        if (json() instanceof ObjectNode on)
147            return toMap(on, Function.identity());
148        return Collections.emptyMap();
149    }
150
151    default String toJsonString() {
152        return json().toPrettyString();
153    }
154
155    static ArrayNode toArray(Collection<? extends JsonElement> elements) {
156        ArrayNode array = JsonNodeFactory.instance.arrayNode(elements.size());
157        for (JsonElement element : elements) {
158            array.add(element.json());
159        }
160        return array;
161    }
162
163    static ArrayNode toArray(JsonElement... elements) {
164        ArrayNode array = JsonNodeFactory.instance.arrayNode(elements.length);
165        for (JsonElement element : elements) {
166            array.add(element.json());
167        }
168        return array;
169    }
170
171    static ArrayNode toArray(String... values) {
172        ArrayNode array = JsonNodeFactory.instance.arrayNode(values.length);
173        for (String value : values) {
174            array.add(array.textNode(value));
175        }
176        return array;
177    }
178
179    static Collector<JsonNode, ArrayNode, ArrayNode> toArray() {
180        return Collector.of(JsonNodeFactory.instance::arrayNode,
181                (array, node) -> {
182                    if (node != null) array.add(node);
183                }, (builder1, builder2) -> builder1, Function.identity());
184    }
185
186    static <T, U extends JsonNode> List<T> getValuesAs(ContainerNode<?> arrayNode, Function<U, T> mapFunction) {
187        List<T> list = new ArrayList<>(arrayNode.size());
188        for (JsonNode jsonNode : arrayNode) {
189            list.add(mapFunction.apply((U) jsonNode));
190        }
191        return list;
192    }
193
194    static Map<String, JsonNode> asMap(ObjectNode objectNode) {
195        return toMap(objectNode, Function.identity());
196    }
197
198    static <T> Map<String, T> toMap(ObjectNode object, Function<JsonNode, T> valueMapper) {
199        Map<String, T> result = new LinkedHashMap<>(object.size());
200        Iterator<Map.Entry<String, JsonNode>> fields = object.fields();
201        while (fields.hasNext()) {
202            Map.Entry<String, JsonNode> next = fields.next();
203            result.put(next.getKey(), valueMapper.apply(next.getValue()));
204        }
205        return result;
206    }
207
208    static <T> Function<ObjectNode, Map<String, T>> toMap(Function<JsonNode, T> valueMapper) {
209        return object ->
210        {
211            Map<String, T> result = new LinkedHashMap<>(object.size());
212            Iterator<Map.Entry<String, JsonNode>> fields = object.fields();
213            while (fields.hasNext()) {
214                Map.Entry<String, JsonNode> next = fields.next();
215                result.put(next.getKey(), valueMapper.apply(next.getValue()));
216            }
217            return result;
218        };
219    }
220
221    static <T> Map<String, T> toFlatMap(ObjectNode object, Function<JsonNode, T> mapper) {
222        Map<String, T> result = new LinkedHashMap<>(object.size());
223        toFlatMap(result, "", object, mapper);
224        return result;
225    }
226
227    static <T> Function<ObjectNode, Map<String, T>> toFlatMap(Function<JsonNode, T> mapper) {
228        return object ->
229        {
230            Map<String, T> result = new LinkedHashMap<>(object.size());
231            toFlatMap(result, "", object, mapper);
232            return result;
233        };
234    }
235
236    static <T> void toFlatMap(Map<String, T> result, String prefix, ObjectNode object, Function<JsonNode, T> mapper) {
237        Iterator<Map.Entry<String, JsonNode>> fields = object.fields();
238        while (fields.hasNext()) {
239            Map.Entry<String, JsonNode> next = fields.next();
240            if (next.getValue().getNodeType().equals(JsonNodeType.OBJECT)) {
241                toFlatMap(result, prefix + next.getKey() + ".", (ObjectNode) next.getValue(), mapper);
242            } else {
243                JsonNode value = next.getValue();
244                T mappedValue = mapper.apply(value);
245                result.put(prefix + next.getKey(), mappedValue);
246            }
247        }
248    }
249
250    static Optional<JsonNode> lookup(ContainerNode<?> c, String name) {
251        if (!name.startsWith(".") && name.indexOf('.') != -1) {
252            String[] names = name.split("\\.");
253            for (int i = 0; i < names.length - 1; i++) {
254                JsonNode node = c.get(names[i]);
255                if (node instanceof ContainerNode)
256                    c = (ContainerNode<?>) node;
257                else
258                    return Optional.empty();
259            }
260            JsonNode value = c.get(names[names.length - 1]);
261            return value instanceof NullNode ? Optional.empty() : Optional.ofNullable(value);
262        } else {
263            if (name.startsWith(".")) {
264                name = name.substring(1);
265            }
266            JsonNode value = c.get(name);
267            return value instanceof NullNode ? Optional.empty() : Optional.ofNullable(value);
268        }
269    }
270}
